idea:
Presenting India's Premiere Collaborative Travel Planner & Itinerary Builder!
Manage Itineraries and Trips very easily!
Our Vision is to give you "The Seamless Travel Experience"
*The RouteMap*
Tired of managing your itinerary on notepads and chats? Here's the perfect solution. Plan it day-wise and down to the hour and that too with your friends! Book an Uber from the app, navigate using Maps.
*Memories*
Share photos instantly with your travel buddies, and have them segregated according to your trip. No longer searching in your gallery.
*Bookings Flights*
The cheapest and the most reliable airfares for over 90+ airlines are here! We have the most transparent pricing in the industry assured to giving you the best pricing. Flight booking has never been easier and cheaper. We have the cheapest tickets.
Featured domestic airlines: Jet Airways, Indigo, Spice Jet, Go Air, Vistara, Air India
Featured international airlines: Etihad, Emirates, British Airways, Thai Airways, Lufthansa, Virgin Atlantic
*Booking Hotels*
Hotels from various aggregators in one place. Book hotels at the lowest convenience fee and the cheapest prices all over the globe. Premium hotels will never be cheaper with us.
*Essentials*
Never forget those headphones or powerbanks you so desperately wanted on your trip.
*Expenses*
Why are you doing the hardwork of calculating the expenses & who owes who what?
Let us do the hardwork! Just enter the expense details and have us split them for you... You just sit back and relax! You're on vacation...
*Panic Button*
We really hope you do not have to use this feature, but it's better to be prepared always.
Your very own BAT Signal. We will notify your loved ones in the times of mishaps or despair.
name: WEIRD LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are an organisation that is changing the perception of eating habits among consumers. We are providing an opportunity to eat calculated food in terms of calories, protein, carbs and fats. Our aim is to make fitter India. We have break down the entire day calories into 6 meals. Customer order once and we deliver Breakfast, Post breakfast, Lunch, Post Lunch, Dinner and post Dinner with the information of macros on it. The food does not contain single drop of OIL. Consumer also get to know how many calories they have consumed in a day. So Exercise accordingly.
name: My Gym Food

idea:
Who we are

Skilled Professional & Learner – Artist & Innovator

We are a team of professionals with engineering, arts, and management background who does work with creativity, innovative hybrid design with thought process involved in it. We do see challenges in daily work, accept it, set our curiosity and confident execute it and serve the customer with humbleness and humanity. Our team members passionate about technology and see the future with potential use of it and empower the peoples with knowledge, intern they will know where to apply.  We are starting small, but we believe that we have the ability to change the world if we stay focused and remain true to our values. 

 

What we do for

 

Systems Thinking for the Design of Thinking Peoples

The technology and especially Digital Transformation in business in all verticals and extra miles to reach to farmers, and last person of the country will make potential to make paradigm shifts in the social sector too. The AI, VR and AR will change the perception among the peoples it will be transition to use of computing and internet for their well being. At QuBeta, we bring our technical expertise, thought process, design thinking, power of altruism will bring to see new approach to problem solution, definition, and change management. The combination of technology and thinking of peoples will pave the way for innovation, productive use; widespread adoption in lives will bring a new process of knowledge management. The flow of information will become how to get perfect answer.

 

QuBeta is poised to make new change in lives with positive attitude among the peoples who we serve with altruism.
name: QUBETA SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED
